22#else
23#define XESS_API __declspec(dllimport)
24#endif
25#else

27#endif

32#if !defined _MSC_VER || (_MSC_VER >= 1929)
33#define XESS_PRAGMA(x) _Pragma(#x)
34#else
35#define XESS_PRAGMA(x) __pragma(x)
36#endif
37#define XESS_PACK_B_X(x) XESS_PRAGMA(pack(push, x))
38#define XESS_PACK_E() XESS_PRAGMA(pack(pop))
39#define XESS_PACK_B() XESS_PACK_B_X(8)

55typedef struct _xess_version_t
56{
59 uint16_t major;
62 uint16_t minor;
67 uint16_t patch;
69 uint16_t reserved;
70} xess_version_t;

92typedef enum _xess_quality_settings_t
93{
94 XESS_QUALITY_SETTING_PERFORMANCE = 101,
95 XESS_QUALITY_SETTING_BALANCED = 102,
96 XESS_QUALITY_SETTING_QUALITY = 103,
97 XESS_QUALITY_SETTING_ULTRA_QUALITY = 104,
98} xess_quality_settings_t;
99
103typedef enum _xess_init_flags_t
104{
105 XESS_INIT_FLAG_NONE = 0,
107 XESS_INIT_FLAG_HIGH_RES_MV = 1 << 0,
109 XESS_INIT_FLAG_INVERTED_DEPTH = 1 << 1,
111 XESS_INIT_FLAG_EXPOSURE_SCALE_TEXTURE = 1 << 2,
113 XESS_INIT_FLAG_RESPONSIVE_PIXEL_MASK = 1 << 3,
115 XESS_INIT_FLAG_USE_NDC_VELOCITY = 1 << 4,
117 XESS_INIT_FLAG_EXTERNAL_DESCRIPTOR_HEAP = 1 << 5,
119 XESS_INIT_FLAG_LDR_INPUT_COLOR = 1 << 6,
121 XESS_INIT_FLAG_JITTERED_MV = 1 << 7,
123 XESS_INIT_FLAG_ENABLE_AUTOEXPOSURE = 1 << 8
124} xess_init_flags_t;
125
126XESS_PACK_B()

131{

137 uint64_t tempTextureHeapSize;
138} xess_properties_t;

144typedef enum _xess_result_t
145{
147 XESS_RESULT_WARNING_NONEXISTING_FOLDER = 1,
149 XESS_RESULT_WARNING_OLD_DRIVER = 2,
151 XESS_RESULT_SUCCESS = 0,
153 XESS_RESULT_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_DEVICE = -1,
155 XESS_RESULT_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_DRIVER = -2,
157 XESS_RESULT_ERROR_UNINITIALIZED = -3,
159 XESS_RESULT_ERROR_INVALID_ARGUMENT = -4,
161 XESS_RESULT_ERROR_DEVICE_OUT_OF_MEMORY = -5,
163 XESS_RESULT_ERROR_DEVICE = -6,
165 XESS_RESULT_ERROR_NOT_IMPLEMENTED = -7,
167 XESS_RESULT_ERROR_INVALID_CONTEXT = -8,
169 XESS_RESULT_ERROR_OPERATION_IN_PROGRESS = -9,
171 XESS_RESULT_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED = -10,
173 XESS_RESULT_ERROR_CANT_LOAD_LIBRARY = -11,
174
176 XESS_RESULT_ERROR_UNKNOWN = -1000,
177} xess_result_t;
178
182typedef enum _xess_logging_level_t
183{
184 XESS_LOGGING_LEVEL_DEBUG = 0,
185 XESS_LOGGING_LEVEL_INFO = 1,
186 XESS_LOGGING_LEVEL_WARNING = 2,
187 XESS_LOGGING_LEVEL_ERROR = 3
188} xess_logging_level_t;
189
195 typedef void (*xess_app_log_callback_t)(const char *message, xess_logging_level_t loggingLevel);
